Programa de Agua y Saneamiento Rural
Rural Water and Sanitation Program

description.narrative: La operación propuesta mejorará la calidad de vida y la capacidad de generar ingresos en la población de las áreas rurales a través de aumentar el acceso al agua potable y servicios sanitarios.
The proposed operation will seek to improve the quality of life of rural communities through increased access to potable water and sanitation services.

title.narrative: By the end of Program execution, in participating communities, water committees (CAEPAs) are capable of operating, maintaining and managing the improved water and sanitation systems in their community within one year of system completion.
